a.span: Distance Learning Teacher Portals and Schedules
Ms. Lawrence Video to Middle School Parents and Students 4.13.2020

div.h2: Welcome to Triad Math and Science Academy

div.p:
Triad Math and Science Academy is a STEM-focused, tuition-free public charter school committed to providing high quality and enriching educational experience that targets 21st-century skills for elementary, middle and high school students in Greensboro, NC. Students will be equipped with strong core knowledge and higher-order skills, including critical and creative thinking, problem-solving, effective communication, and collaboration skills. To fulfill our mission, TMSA implements a well-defined curriculum supported by research and with a strong emphasis on science, technology, engineering, arts, and mathematics; builds strong school-family-community partnerships; creates a safe, nurturing, engaging, caring and culturally-responsive learning environment; and facilitates intentional teacher-student relationships.
The core values of TMSA are responsibility, respect, resilience, diversity, courage, and industriousness. Fundamental to our mission is acommitment to theactive involvement of our students, competent and caring staff and leadership, innovative and effective teaching strategies, and striving for academic excellence for all students.
